GE07bhg4c12u:54_1: sākṣāt-kartum īhante paramātma-kāmās teṣām ubhayeṣāṃ madhye yoga-vittamāḥ śīghropāyinaḥ

GE07bhg4c12u:67: nitya-yuktā mad-artha-karmānuṣṭhānādinā man-niṣṭhāḥ santaḥ śreṣṭhayā śraddhayā yuktā ye mām ārādhayanti te yuktatamā mamābhimatāḥ ||2||
GE07bhg4c12u:69: viśvanāthaḥ --- tatra mad-bhaktāḥ śreṣṭhā ity āha mayi śyāmasundarākāre mama āveśyāviṣṭaṃ kṛtvā nitya-yuktā man-nitya-yoga-kāṅkṣiṇaḥ parayā guṇātītayā śraddhayā | yad uktaṃ -

GE07bhg4c12u:72: te me madīyā ananya-bhaktā yuktatamā yoga-vittamā ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:73: tenānanya-bhaktebhyo nyūnā anye jñāna-karmādi-miśra-bhaktimanto yoga-vittarā ity artho 'bhivyañjito bhavati |
GE07bhg4c12u:74: tataś ca jñānād bhaktiḥ śreṣṭhā bhaktāv apy ananya-bhaktiḥ śreṣṭhety upapāditam ||2||

GE07bhg4c12u:76: ye bhaktā mayi nīlotpala-śyāmalatvādi-dharmiṇi svayaṃ bhagavati devakī-sūnau mana āveśya nirataṃ kṛtvā parayā dṛḍhayā śraddhayopetāḥ santo mām ukta-lakṣaṇam upāsate |
GE07bhg4c12u:78: nitya-yuktā nityaṃ mad-yogam icchantas te mama matena yuktatamā matāḥ |

GE07bhg4c12u:97_0: madhusūdanaḥ - nirguṇa-brahma-vid-apekṣayā saguṇa-brahma-vidāṃ ko 'tiśayo yena ta

GE07bhg4c12u:98: ye 'kṣaram mām upāsate te 'pi mām eva prāpnuvantīti dvitīya-gatenānvayaḥ |

GE07bhg4c12u:198: yadyapi pūrveṣām api tat-tan-mad-bhakty-asaṅga-samācāro mad-anya-viṣayebhyaḥ karaṇānāṃ pratyāhāraś ca kleśo 'sty eva,
GE07bhg4c12u:199: tathāi tatrānanda-mūrter mama sphuraṇān na kleśatayā vibhāti |
GE07bhg4c12u:201: hi yasmād avyaktā gatir avyaktākṣara-viṣayā mano-vṛttir dehavadbhir dehābhimānibhir janair duḥkhaṃ yathā syāt tathāvāpyate |
GE07bhg4c12u:202: dehavantaḥ khalu sthūla-deham eva sucirād ātmatvenānuśīlitavantaḥ katham aṇu-caitanyaṃ sucirojjhita-vimarśam ātmatvenānuśīlituṃ prabhaveyur iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:205: tatra saguṇopāsanam ākāravad-viṣayatvāt sukaram apramādaṃ ca |
GE07bhg4c12u:206: nirguṇopāsanaṃ tu tattvābhāvād duḥkha-karaṃ sa-pramādaṃ ca |
GE07bhg4c12u:208: nairguṇya-pratipattaye sapta viśeṣaṇāni anirdeśyaṃ vedāgocaraṃ, yato 'vyaktaṃ jātyādi-śūnyam |
GE07bhg4c12u:211: śrutiś ca - yato vāco nivartante aprāpya manasā saha [TaittU 2.4.1] ity ādyā |
GE07bhg4c12u:212: kūṭasthaṃ mithā-bhūtam api satyavat pratītaṃ jagat kūṭam ucyate |
GE07bhg4c12u:215: acaram avikāram ato dhruvaṃ nityam iti |
GE07bhg4c12u:218: tad idaṃ mandaṃ gati-sāmānyāt iti sūtre brahmaṇo dvairūpya-nirāsāt |
GE07bhg4c12u:219: yathā tad akṣaram adhigamyate iti tasya veda-vedyatva-śravaṇāt |
GE07bhg4c12u:221: pravṛtti-nimittābhāvena nirguṇasyāpramāṇatvāt taucchyāc ca lakṣyatvaṃ tu na,
GE07bhg4c12u:223: sadaikāvasthasya vastunaḥ kūṭasthatvenābhidhānān na ca jagat kūṭam |
GE07bhg4c12u:230: ye tu sarvāṇi karmāṇi mayi saṃnyasya mat-parāḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:233: bhavāmi na cirāt pārtha mayy āveśita-cetasām ||7||
GE07bhg4c12u:234: śrīdharaḥ - mad-bhaktānāṃ tu mat-prasādād anāyāsenaiva siddhir bhavatīty āha ye tv iti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c12u:235: ye mayi parameśvare sarvāṇi karmāṇi saṃnyasya samarpya mat-parā bhūtvā |
GE07bhg4c12u:237: ananyena na vidyate 'nyo bhajanīyo yasmiṃs tenaiva |
GE07bhg4c12u:240: evaṃ mayy āveśitaṃ ceto yais teṣām |
GE07bhg4c12u:241: mṛtyu-yuktāt saṃsāra-sāgarād ahaṃ samyag uddhartācireṇa bhavāmi ||7||
GE07bhg4c12u:242: madhusūdanaḥ - nanu phalaikye kleśālpatvādhikyābhyāsam utkarṣa-nikarṣau syātāṃ,
GE07bhg4c12u:243: tad eva tu nāsti nirguṇa-brahma-vidāṃ hi phalam avidyā-tat-kārya-nivṛttyā nirviśeṣa-paramānanda-bodha-brahma-rūpatā |
GE07bhg4c12u:244: saguṇa-brahma-vidāṃ tv adhiṣṭhāna-pramāyā abhāvenāvidyā-nivṛtty-abhāvād aiśvarya-viśeṣaḥ kārya-brahma-loka-gatānāṃ phalam |
GE07bhg4c12u:245: ataḥ phalādhikyārtham āyāsādhikyaṃ na nyūnatām āpādayatīit cet,
GE07bhg4c12u:246_0: na suguṇopāsanayā nirasta-sarva-pratibandhānāṃ vinā gurūpadeśaṃ vinā ca śravaṇa-manana-nididhyāsanādy-āvṛtti-kleśaṃ
GE07bhg4c12u:247: sa etasmāj jīva-ghanāt parātparaṃ puriśayaṃ puruṣam
GE07bhg4c12u:248_0: īkṣate iti śruteḥ sa prāpta-hiraṇyagarbhaiśvaryo bhogānta etasmāj jīva-ghanāt sarva-jīva-samaṣṭi-rūpāt
GE07bhg4c12u:248_1: parāc chreṣṭhād dhiraṇyagarbhāt paraṃ vilakṣaṇaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ ca puriśayaṃ sva-hṛdaya-guhā-niviṣṭaṃ
GE07bhg4c12u:248_2: puruṣaṃ pūrṇaṃ pratyag-abhinnam advitīyaṃ paramātmānam īkṣate svayam āvirbhūtena
GE07bhg4c12u:250: tathā ca vināpi prāg-ukta-kleśena saguṇa-brahma-vidām īśvara-prasādena nirguṇa-brahma-vidyā-phala-prāptir itīmam artham āha ye tv iti dvyābhyām |
GE07bhg4c12u:252_0: ye sarvāṇi karmāṇi mayi saṃnyasya saguṇe vāsudeve samarpya mat-parā ahaṃ bhagavān
GE07bhg4c12u:252_1: vāsudeva eva paraḥ prakṛṣṭaḥ prīti-viṣayo yeṣāṃ te tathā santo 'nanyenaiva yogena
GE07bhg4c12u:252_2: na vidyate māṃ bhagavantaṃ muktvānyad-ālambanaṃ yasya tādṛśenaiva yogena samādhinaikānta-bhakti-yogāpara-nāmnā
GE07bhg4c12u:252_3: māṃ bhagavantaṃ vāsudevaṃ sakala-saundarya-sāra-nidhānam ānanda-ghana-vigrahaṃ dvibhujaṃ
GE07bhg4c12u:252_4: caturbhujaṃ vā samasta-jana-mano-mohinīṃ muralīm antimanoharaiḥ saptabhiḥ svarair
GE07bhg4c12u:252_6: vā yathā-darśita-viśva-rūpaṃ vā dhyāyanta upāsate samānākāram avicchinnaṃ citta-vṛtti-pravāhaṃ
GE07bhg4c12u:252_7: saṃtanvate samīpa-vartitayā 'sate tisṭhanti vā tesāṃ mayy āveśita-cetasāṃ
GE07bhg4c12u:253_0: mayi yathokta āveśitam ekāgratayā praveśitaṃ ceto yais teṣām ahaṃ satatopāsito bhagavān
GE07bhg4c12u:253_1: mṛtyu-saṃsāra-sāgarām mṛtyu-yukto yaḥ saṃsāro mithyā-jñāna-tat-kārya-prapañcaḥ sa
GE07bhg4c12u:253_2: eva sāgarā iva duruttaras tasmāt samuddhartā samyag anāyasenordhve sarva-bādhāv adhibhūte
GE07bhg4c12u:253_3: śuddhe brahmaṇi dhartā dhārayitā jñānāvaṣṭambha-dānena bhavāmi na cirāt kṣipram eva
GE07bhg4c12u:255: viśvanāthaḥ --- bhaktānāṃ tu jñānaṃ vinaiva kevalayā bhaktyaiva sukhena saṃsārān muktir ity āha ye tv iti |
GE07bhg4c12u:256: mayi yat prānty arthaṃ saṃnyasya tyaktvā saṃnyāsa-śabdasya tyāgārthatvāt |
GE07bhg4c12u:257: ananyenaiva jñāna-karma-tapasyādi-rahitenaiva yogena bhakti-yogena yad uktaṃ yat karmabhir yat tapasā jñāna-vairāgyataś ca yat [BhP 11.20.32] ity anantaram |
GE07bhg4c12u:259: svargāpavargaṃ mad-dhāma kathañcid yadi vāñchati || [BhP 11.20.33] iti |
GE07bhg4c12u:260: nanu tad api teṣāṃ saṃsāra-taraṇe kaḥ prakāra iti cet ? satyaṃ |
GE07bhg4c12u:262: yatas tat-prakāraṃ vinaivāham eva tāṃs tārayiṣyāmīty āha teṣām iti |
GE07bhg4c12u:263: tena bhagavato bhakteṣv eva vātsalyaṃ na tu jñāniṣv iti dhvaniḥ ||6-7||
GE07bhg4c12u:264: baladevaḥ - tathātma-yāthātmyaṃ śrutvaivātmāṃśino mama kevalāṃ bhaktiṃ ye kurvanti,
GE07bhg4c12u:266: teṣāṃ tu kevalayā mad-bhaktyaiva mat-prāptir acireṇaiva syād ity āha ye tv iti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c12u:267_0: ye mad-ekāntino mayi mat-prāpty-arthaṃ sarvāṇi sva-vihitāny api karmāṇi saṃnyasya
GE07bhg4c12u:267_2: kevalena mac-chravaṇādi-lakṣaṇena yogenopāyena māṃ kṛṣṇam upāsate |
GE07bhg4c12u:268: tal-lakṣaṇāṃ mad-upāsanāṃ kurvanti dhyāyantaḥ śravaṇādi-kāle 'pi man-niviṣṭa-manasaḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:269: teṣāṃ mayy āveśita-cetasāṃ mad-ekānurakta-manasāṃ bhaktānām aham eva mṛtyu-yuktāt saṃsārāt sāgaravad dustarāt samuddhartā bhavāmi |
GE07bhg4c12u:270: na cirāt tvarayā tat-prāpti-vilambāsahamānas tān ahaṃ garuḍa-skandham āropya sva-dhāma
GE07bhg4c12u:272: nayāmi paramaṃ sthānam arcir ādi-gatiṃ vinā |
GE07bhg4c12u:273: garuḍa-skandham āropya yatheccham anivāritaḥ || iti vārāha-vacanāt |
GE07bhg4c12u:276: tayā vinā tad āpnoti naro nārāyaṇāśrayaḥ || iti nārāyaṇīyāt |
GE07bhg4c12u:278: sukhena yāṃ gatiṃ yānti na tāṃ sarve 'pi dhārmikāḥ || iti pādmāc ca ||6-7||
GE07bhg4c12u:281: mayy eva mana ādhatsva mayi buddhiṃ niveśaya |
GE07bhg4c12u:282: nivasiṣyasi mayy eva ata ūrdhvaṃ na saṃśayaḥ ||8||
GE07bhg4c12u:283: śrīdharaḥ - yasmād evaṃ tasmāt mayy eveti |
GE07bhg4c12u:284: mayy eva saṅkalpa-vikalpātmakaṃ mana ādhatsva sthirīkuru |
GE07bhg4c12u:285: buddhim api vyavasāyātmikāṃ mayy eva niveśaya |
GE07bhg4c12u:286: evaṃ kurvan mat-prasādena labdha-jñānaḥ san ata ata ūrdhvaṃ dehānte mayy eva nivasiṣyasi nivatsyasi |
GE07bhg4c12u:289: yathā ca śrutiḥ dehānte devaḥ paraṃ brahmā tārakaṃ vyacaṣṭe iti ||8||
GE07bhg4c12u:290: madhusūdanaḥ - tad evam iyatā prabandhena saguṇopāsanāṃ stutvedānīṃ vidhatte mayy eveti |
GE07bhg4c12u:291: mayy eva saguṇe brahmaṇi manaḥ saṅkalpa-vikalpātmakam ādhatsva sthāpaya sarvā manovṛttīr mad-viṣayā eva kuru |
GE07bhg4c12u:292: eva-kārānuṣaṅgena mayy eva buddhim adhyavasāya-lakṣaṇāṃ niveśaya |
GE07bhg4c12u:293: sarvā buddhi-vṛttīr mad-viṣayā eva kuru, viṣayāntara-parityāgena sarvadā māṃ cintayety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:294: tataḥ kiṃ syād ity ata āha nivasiṣyasi nivatsyasi labdha-jñānaḥ san mad-ātmanā mayy eva śuddha ata ūrdhvam etad-dehānte na saṃśayo nātra pratibandha-śaṅkā kartavyety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:295: eva ata ūrdhvam ity atra sandhy-abhāvaḥ śloka-pūraṇārthaḥ ||8||
GE07bhg4c12u:296: viśvanāthaḥ --- yasmān mad-bhaktir eva śreṣṭhā tasmāt tvaṃ bhaktim eva kurv iti tām upadiśati mayy eveti tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:298: mayi śyāmasundare pītāmbare vanamālini mana ādhatsva mat-smaraṇaṃ kurv ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:299: tathā buddhiṃ vivekavatīṃ niveśaya man-mananaṃ kurv ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:301: tataś ca mayy eva nivasiṣyasīti chāndasam |
GE07bhg4c12u:303: baladevaḥ -- yasmād evaṃ tasmāt tvaṃ mayy eva na tu svātmani mana ādhatsva samāhitaṃ kuru |
GE07bhg4c12u:305: evaṃ kurvāṇas tvaṃ mayy eva mama kṛṣṇasya sannidhāv eva nivatsyasi,
GE07bhg4c12u:306: na tu sa-niṣṭhavat sargādikam anubhavann aiśvarya-pradhānaṃ māṃ prāpsyasīty arthaḥ ||8||
GE07bhg4c12u:309: atha cittaṃ samādhātuṃ na śaknoṣi mayi sthiram |
GE07bhg4c12u:311: śrīdharaḥ - atrāśaktaṃ prati sugamopāyam āha atheti |
GE07bhg4c12u:312_0: sthiraṃ yathā bhavaty evaṃ mayi cittaṃ dhārayituṃ yadi śakto na bhavasi tarhi vikṣiptaṃ
GE07bhg4c12u:312_1: cittaṃ punaḥ punaḥ pratyāhṛtya mad-anusmaraṇa-lakṣaṇo yo 'bhyāsa-yogas tena māṃ prāptum iccha |
GE07bhg4c12u:314_0: madhusūdanaḥ - idānīṃ saguṇa-brahma-dhyānāśaktānām aśakti-tāratāmyena prathamaṃ pratimādau
GE07bhg4c12u:314_1: bāhye bhagavad-dhyānābhyāsas tad-aśaktau bhāgavata-dharmānuṣṭhānaṃ tad-aśaktau sarva-karma-phala-tyāga
GE07bhg4c12u:314_2: iti trīṇi sādhanāni tribhiḥ ślokair vidhatte atheti |
GE07bhg4c12u:315_0: atha pakṣāntare sthiraṃ yathā syāt tathā cittaṃ samādhātuṃ sthāpayituṃ mayi na śaknoṣi
GE07bhg4c12u:315_1: cet tata ekasmin pratimādāv ālambane sarvataḥ samāhṛtya cetasaḥ punaḥ punaḥ sthāpanam
GE07bhg4c12u:315_2: abhyāsas tat-pūrvako yogaḥ samādhis tenābhyāsa-yogena mām āptum iccha yatasva |
GE07bhg4c12u:316: he dhanañjaya ! bahūn śatrūn jitvā dhanam āhṛtavān asi rājasūyādy-artham ekaṃ manaḥ-śatruṃ jitvā tatva-jñāna-dhanam āhariṣyasīti na tavāścaryam iti sambodhanārthaḥ ||9||
GE07bhg4c12u:317: viśvanāthaḥ --- sākṣāt smaraṇāsamarthaṃ prati tat-prāpty-upāyam āha atheti |
GE07bhg4c12u:318: abhyāsa-yogenānyatrānyatra gatam api manaḥ punaḥ pratyāhṛtya mad-rūpa eva sthāpanam abhyāsaḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:320: prākṛtatvād iti kutsita-rūpa-rasādiṣu calantyā manonadyās teṣu calanaṃ nirudhya atisubhadreṣu madīya-rūpa-rasādiṣu tac-calanaṃ śanaiḥ śanaiḥ sampādayety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:321: he dhanañjayeti bahūn śatrūn jitvā dhanam āhṛtavatā tvayā mano 'pi jitvā dhyāna-dhanaṃ grahītuṃ śakyam eveti bhāvaḥ ||9||
GE07bhg4c12u:322: baladevaḥ - nanu gaṅgeva yeṣāṃ mano-vṛtti-rodhavatī teṣāṃ tvat-prāptis tvarayā syān mama tu tādṛśī na tad-vṛttis tataḥ kathaṃ seti cet tatrāha atheti |
GE07bhg4c12u:323: sthiraṃ yathā syāt tathā mayi cittaṃ samyag anāyāsenādhātum arpayituṃ na śaknoṣi cet tato 'bhyāsa-yogena mām āptum iccha yatasva |
GE07bhg4c12u:324: tato 'nyatra gatasya manasaḥ pratyāhṛtya śanaiḥ śanair mayi sthāpanam abhyāsas tena manasi mat-pravaṇe sati mat-prāptiḥ sulabhā syād iti bhāvaḥ ||9||
GE07bhg4c12u:328: mad-artham api karmāṇi kurvan siddhim avāpsyasi ||10||
GE07bhg4c12u:329: śrīdharaḥ - yadi punar naivaṃ tatrāha abhyāsa iti |
GE07bhg4c12u:330: yadi punar abhyāse 'py aśakto 'si tarhi mat-prīty-arthāni yāni karmāṇi ekādaśy-upavāsa-vrata-caryā-pūjā-nāma-saṅkīrtanādīni tad-anuṣṭhānam eva paramaṃ yasya tādṛśo bhava |
GE07bhg4c12u:331: evaṃ-bhūtāni karmāṇy api mad-arthaṃ kurvan mokṣaṃ prāpsyasi ||10||
GE07bhg4c12u:332: madhusūdanaḥ - mat-prīṇanārthaṃ karma mat-karma śravaṇa-kīrtanādi-bhāgavata-dharmas tat-paramas tad-eka-niṣṭho bhava |
GE07bhg4c12u:333: abhyāsāsamarthye mad-arthaṃ bhāgavata-dharma-saṃjñakāni karmāṇy api kurvan siddhiṃ brahma-bhāva-lakṣaṇāṃ sattva-śuddhi-jñānotpatti-dvāreṇāvāpsyasi ||10||
GE07bhg4c12u:334: viśvanāthaḥ --- abhyāse 'pīti yathā pitta-dūṣitā rasanā matsyaṇḍikāṃ necchati |
GE07bhg4c12u:335: tathaivāvidyā-dūṣitaṃ manas tad-rūpādikaṃ madhuram api na gṛhṇātīty atas tena durgraheṇa mahā-prabalena manasā saha yoddhuṃ mayā naiva śakyata iti manyase ced iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:337_1: kurvan vināpi mat-smaraṇaṃ siddhiṃ premavat-pārṣadatva-lakṣaṇāṃ prāpsyatīti ||10 ||
GE07bhg4c12u:338: baladevaḥ - nanu vāyor iva manaso 'ticāpalyāt tasya pratyāhāre mama na śaktir iti cet tatrāha abhyāse 'pīti |
GE07bhg4c12u:339: ukta-lakṣaṇe 'bhyāse 'pi cet tvam asamarthas tarhi mat-karmāṇi paramāṇi pumartha-bhūtāni yasya tādṛśo bhava |
GE07bhg4c12u:341_0: evaṃ sukarāṇi mad-arthāni karmāṇi kurvāṇas tvaṃ tatra tarāti-manojña-man-mūrty-uddeśa-mahimnā
GE07bhg4c12u:341_1: tādṛśe mayi nirata-manāḥ saṃsiddhiṃ mat-sāmīpya-lakṣaṇām avāpsyasīty atisugamo 'yam upāyaḥ ||10 ||
GE07bhg4c12u:344: athaitad apy aśakto 'si kartuṃ mad-yogam āśritaḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:346: śrīdharaḥ - atyantaṃ bhagavad-dharma-pariniṣṭhāyām aśaktasya pakṣāntaram āha atheti |
GE07bhg4c12u:347_0: yady etad api kartuṃ na śaknoṣi tarhi mad-ayogaṃ mad-eka-śaraṇatvam āśritaḥ san sarveṣāṃ
GE07bhg4c12u:347_1: dṛṣṭādṛṣṭārthānām āvaśyakānāṃ cāgnihotrādi-karmaṇāṃ phalāni niyata-cittaṃ bhūs tvā parityaja |
GE07bhg4c12u:348: etad uktaṃ bhavati mayā tāvad īśvarājñayā yathā-śakti karmāṇi kartavyāni |
GE07bhg4c12u:349: phalaṃ tāvad dṛṣṭam adṛṣṭaṃ vā parameśvarādhīnam ity evaṃ mayi bhāram āropya phalāsaktiṃ parityajya vartamāno mat-prasādena kṛtārtho bhaviṣyasīti ||11||
GE07bhg4c12u:350: madhusūdanaḥ - atha bahir-viṣayākṛṣṭa-cetastvād etan-mat-karma-paratvam api kartuṃ na śaknoṣi,
GE07bhg4c12u:351_0: tato mad-yogaṃ mad-eka-śaraṇatvam āśrito mayi sarva-karma-samarpaṇaṃ mad-yogas taṃ
GE07bhg4c12u:351_1: vāśritaḥ san yatātmavān yataḥ saṃyata-sarvendriya ātmavān vivekī ca san sarva-karma-phala-tyāgaṃ
GE07bhg4c12u:352: viśvanāthaḥ --- etad api kartum aśaktaś cet tarhi mad-yogam āśrito mayi sarva-karma-samarpaṇam |
GE07bhg4c12u:353: mad-yogas tam āśritaḥ san sarva-karma-phala-tyāgaṃ prathama-ṣaṭkoktaṃ kuru |
GE07bhg4c12u:354: ayam arthaḥ -- prathama-ṣaṭke bhagavad-arpita-niṣkāma-karma-yoga eva mokṣopāya uktaḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:356: sa ca bhakti-yogo dvividhaḥ - bhagavan-niṣṭho 'ntaḥ-karaṇa-vyāpāro, bahiṣkaraṇa-vyāpāraś ca |
GE07bhg4c12u:358: mananātmakaś cākhaṇḍa-smaraṇāsāmarthye tad-anurāgināṃ tad-abhyāsa-rūpaṃ ceti trika evāyaṃ manda-dhiyāṃ durgamaḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:360: dvitīyaḥ śravaṇa-kīrtanātmakaṃ tu sarveṣāṃ sugama evopāyaḥ |

GE07bhg4c12u:582: evaṃ-bhūto bhūtvā yo mad-bhaktimān sa me priyaḥ ||17||
GE07bhg4c12u:585: yo na hṛṣyatīṣṭa-prāptau, na dveṣṭi aniṣṭa-prāptau na śocati prāpteṣṭa-viyoge |
GE07bhg4c12u:587: sarvārambha-parityāgīty etad vivṛṇoti śubhāśubhe sukha-sādhana-duḥkha-sādhane karmaṇī parityaktuṃ śīlam asyeti śubhāśubha-parityāgī bhaktimān yaḥ sa me priyaḥ ||17||
GE07bhg4c12u:589: baladevaḥ - yaḥ priyaṃ putra-śiṣyādi prāpya na hṛṣyati |
GE07bhg4c12u:590: apriyaṃ tat prāpya tatra na dveṣṭi |
GE07bhg4c12u:593: śubhaṃ puṇyam aśubhaṃ pāpaṃ tad-ubhayaṃ pratibandhakatva-sāmyāt parityaktuṃ śīlaṃ yasya saḥ ||17||
GE07bhg4c12u:596: samaḥ śatrau ca mitre ca tathā mānāpamānayoḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:599: aniketaḥ sthira-matir bhaktimān me priyo naraḥ ||19||
GE07bhg4c12u:601: śatrau ca mitre ca sama eka-rūpaḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:612: evaṃ-bhūto bhaktimān yaḥ sa naro mama priyaḥ ||19||
GE07bhg4c12u:620: te duḥkha-sukhājanakatayā tulye yasya sa tathā |
GE07bhg4c12u:622: nanu śarīra-yātrā-nirvāhāya vāg-vyāpāro 'pekṣita eva nety āha saṃtuṣṭo nivṛtta-spṛhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:624: sthirā paramārtha-vastu-viṣayā matir yasya sa sthira-matiḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:625: īdṛśo yo bhaktimān sa me priyo naraḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:626: atra punaḥ punar bhakter upādānaṃ bhaktir evāpavargasya puṣkalaṃ kāraṇam iti draḍhayitum ||19||
GE07bhg4c12u:630: tulyeti nindayā duḥkhaṃ stutyā sukhaṃ ca yo na vindati |
GE07bhg4c12u:632: yena kenacid adṛṣṭākṛṣṭena rukṣeṇa snigdhena vānnādinā santuṣṭaḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:635: eṣv adveṣṭety ādiṣu saptasu yeṣu guṇānāṃ punar apy abhidhānaṃ tat teṣām atidaurlabhya-jñāpanārtham ity adoṣaḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:636: san-niṣṭhādīnāṃ tri-vidhānāṃ bhaktānāṃ sambhūya sthitā ete 'dveṣṭṛtvādayo dharmā yathā-sambhava-tāratamyenaiva sudhībhiḥ saṅgamanīyāḥ ||18-19||
GE07bhg4c12u:639: ye tu dharmyāmṛtam idaṃ yathoktaṃ paryupāsate |
GE07bhg4c12u:640: śraddadhānā mat-paramā bhaktās te 'tīva me priyāḥ ||20||
GE07bhg4c12u:641: śrīdharaḥ : uktaṃ dharma-jātaṃ sapahalam upasaṃharati ye tv iti |
GE07bhg4c12u:655: adveṣṭety ādinākṣaropāsakādīnāṃ jīvanmuktānāṃ saṃnyāsināṃ lakṣaṇa-bhūtaṃ svabhāva-siddhaṃ dharma-jāta-muktam |
GE07bhg4c12u:658: ayatnato bhavanty eva na tu sādhana-rūpiṇaḥ || iti |
GE07bhg4c12u:660: tad idaṃ dharma-jātaṃ prayatnena sampādyamānaṃ mumukṣor mokṣa-sādhanaṃ bhavatīti pratipādayann upasaṃharati ye tv iti |
GE07bhg4c12u:661_0: ye tu saṃnyāsino mumukṣavo dharmāmṛtaṃ dharma-rūpam amṛta-sādhanatvād amṛtavad āsvādyatvād
GE07bhg4c12u:661_1: vedaṃ yathoktam adveṣṭā sarva-bhūtānām ity ādinā pratipāditaṃ paryupāsate 'nutiṣṭhanti
GE07bhg4c12u:661_2: prayatnena śraddadhānāḥ santo mat-paramā ahaṃ bhagavān akṣarātmā vāsudeva eva paramaḥ
GE07bhg4c12u:661_3: prāptavyo niratiśayā gatir yeṣāṃ te mat-paramā bhaktā māṃ nirupādhikaṃ brahma bhajamānās
GE07bhg4c12u:662: priyo hi jñānino 'tyartham ahaṃ sa ca mama priyaḥ iti pūrva-sūcitasyāyam upasaṃhāraḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:663_0: yasmād dharmāmṛtam idaṃ śraddhayānutiṣṭhan bhagavato viṣṇoḥ parameśvarasyātīva priyo
GE07bhg4c12u:663_1: bhavati tasmād idaṃ jñānavataḥ svabhāva-siddhatayā lakṣaṇam api mumukṣuṇātma-tattva-jijñāsunātma-jñānopāyatvena
GE07bhg4c12u:663_2: yatnād anuṣṭheyaṃ viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ jigamiṣuṇeti vākyārthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:669: uktavān bahuvidha-svabhakta-niṣṭhān dharmān upasaṃharan kārtsnyenaital-lipsūnāṃ tac-chravaṇa-vicāraṇādi-phalam āha ye tv iti |
GE07bhg4c12u:670: ete bhakty-uttha-śānty-uttha-dharmā na prākṛtā guṇāḥ bhaktyā tuṣyati kṛṣṇo na guṇaiḥ ity ukta-koṭitaḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:672: ete tu tat-tat-sarva-sal-lakṣaṇepsavaḥ sādhakā api tebhyaḥ siddhebhyo 'pi śreṣṭhāḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:680: baladevaḥ : ukta-bhakti-yogam upasaṃharan tasmin niṣṭhā-phalam āha ye tv iti |
GE07bhg4c12u:681: ye bhaktā yathoktaṃ mayy āveśya mano ye mām ity ādibhir yathā-gatam idaṃ dharmāmṛtaṃ paryupāsate |
GE07bhg4c12u:682: prāpyaṃ mām iva prāpakaṃ tat samāśrayanti |
GE07bhg4c12u:683: śraddadhānā bhakti-śraddhā-lavo mat-paramā man-niratās te mamātīva priyā bhavanti ||20||
GE07bhg4c12u:684: vaśaḥ svaika-juṣāṃ kṛṣṇaḥ sva-bhakty-eka-juṣāṃ tu saḥ |
